org.w3c.jigadmin
Class RemoteResourceWrapper

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.w3c.jigadm.RemoteResourceWrapper
        |
        +--org.w3c.jigadmin.RemoteResourceWrapper
public class RemoteResourceWrapper
extends RemoteResourceWrapper

This class is a wrapper for RemoteResource, used to store the resource tree.
